tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CurriculumData (
  program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  program_name STRING,
  program_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE campus_locations (
    campus_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campus_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    campus_country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    campus_city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    campus_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE course_data (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  course_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  program_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES curriculum_data(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE student_data (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  student_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  course_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_data(course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE curriculum_program (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    program_description TEXT,
    program_start_date DATE,
    program_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE curriculum_assignment (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_id INT REFERENCES curriculum_program(program_id),
    course_id INT REFERENCES course(course_id),
    campus_id INT REFERENCES campus(campus_id),
    assignment_date DATE
);
